name: PC-Clear 1-Hour Epoxy Glue - Waterproof, 2450 psi Strength
description: PC-Clear Liquid Epoxy cures clear in 1 hour making it perfect when you need to disguise a repair. 2 part epoxy requires mixing. This product demonstrates excellent chemical resistance to mild acids, caustics, detergents, gasoline, fuel oil, salt, and fresh water. PC-Clear is very durable and flexible, setting it apart from other liquid epoxies.Allows a 4 minute working time with cure time of 1 hourBonds to most surfacesWaterproof after cured2450 psi tensile strength ratingNot designed to bond to wax paper, Teflon, or polyethylene - test a small area when in doubt
